      • start

        public void start(int port)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Start listening at the given port. This method is non-blocking as the listener runs in a new thread.
        Parameters:
        port - Listening port
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs while initializing the server socket

      • stop

        public void stop()
          throws java.io.IOException
        Stop the server.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs while closing the server socket
